commit.message:
libitm_i.h (_Unwind_DeleteException): Declare weak.

	* libitm_i.h (_Unwind_DeleteException): Declare weak.
	* eh_cpp.cc (_Unwind_DeleteException): Define for
	!HAVE_ELF_STYLE_WEAKREF.

files.patch:
